mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dc_server_setting (host, service_name, post, application_server, user_name, password, db_username, db_password, subject, system_type, crontab, exec_time, time_out) VALUES (#{host}, #{serviceName}, #{post}, #{applicationServer}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{dbUsername}, #{dbPassword}, #{subject}, #{systemType}, #{crontab}, #{execTime}, #{timeOut});
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT p.id, q.host host, q.service_name serviceName, q.post post, q.application_server applicationServer, q.user_name userName, q.password password, q.db_username dbUsername, q.db_password dbPassword, p.sys_version sysVersion, q.subject subject, q.system_type systemType, q.crontab crontab, q.creation_date createTime, q.exec_time execTime, q.time_out timeOut, q.crontab cron, 'name', 'group', q.class_path classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.system_type = p.system_type WHERE q.is_delete = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 ) LEVEL1

SELECT p.id, q.host host, q.service_name serviceName, q.post post, q.application_server applicationServer, q.user_name userName, q.password password, q.db_username dbUsername, q.db_password dbPassword, p.sys_version sysVersion, q.subject subject, q.system_type systemType, q.crontab crontab, q.creation_date createTime, q.exec_time execTime, q.time_out timeOut, q.crontab cron, 'group', q.class_path classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.system_type = p.system_type WHERE q.is_delete = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, q.host host, q.system_type type, q.service_name serviceName, q.post post, q.application_server applicationServer, q.user_name userName, q.password password, q.db_username dbUsername, q.db_password dbPassword, p.sys_version sysVersion, q.subject subject, q.system_type systemType, q.crontab crontab, q.creation_date createTime, q.exec_time execTime, q.time_out timeOut, 'group', q.class_path classPath FROM dc_server_setting q LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting p ON q. HOST = p.IP AND q.system_type = p.system_type WHERE q.is_delete = 0 AND p.is_delete = 0 AND q.CRONTAB = 1
AND host LIKE "%"#{host}"%"

UPDATE dc_server_setting ssh LEFT JOIN dc_distribute_setting dds ON ssh. HOST = dds.IP AND ssh.system_type = dds.system_type SET ssh.host = #{host}, ssh.service_name = #{serviceName}, ssh.post = #{post}, ssh.application_server = #{applicationServer}, ssh.user_name = #{userName}, ssh.db_username = #{dbUsername},
ssh.subject = #{subject}, ssh.system_type = #{systemType}, ssh.crontab = #{crontab}, ssh.password = #{password}, ssh.db_password = #{dbPassword}, ssh.exec_time = #{execTime}, ssh.time_out = #{timeOut} WHERE dds.id = #{id}

UPDATE dc_server_setting ssh SET ssh.is_delete = '1' WHERE ssh.id = #{id};
UPDATE dc_distribute_setting dds SET dds.is_delete = '1' WHERE dds.IP = (SELECT ssh.host FROM dc_server_setting ssh WHERE ssh.id = #{id});
